session.sessionNotFoundMsg: Session not found. Type another code or create a new session to start.
session.typecodeMsg: Type your code, or create new room to start.
session.serverDownMsg: Can not connect server. Check your internet or ask system administrator.
session.aboutText: This application is self-hosted software that provides tutorials using LLM (AI).  The application allows the site administrator to collect data on user usage and statements made in a non-personally identifiable form, and the data collected is used to learn the chat function in the app and to improve the AI's behaviour.  For further information on the handling of data provided by the app, please contact the website administrator. As the application is published as open source and the source code may have been modified, it is recommended not to use the application if the website administrator is unknown.  Data on information about sessions created may be deleted.

tutorial.title: Pick Tutorial
tutorial.description: Choose what you want to learn
tutorial.easyModeDescription: AI's response will be more easier.

logbuffer.tooManyLogs: Too many messages. old logs removed.

tour.joinCode: This is code for this session. You can return back here with saving this code for next time.
tour.blocklyWorkspace: Workspace is place to make your code.
tour.dialogue: You can talk with AI for any help, or take a lesson from AI with tutorial.
tour.tourAgain: You can take this tour again with click this button.
tour.execSwitch: You can run your code on workspace.
tour.tutorialSelector: You can select any tutorial that you want to make.
tour.welcome: Welcome on board! This tour provides a brief overview of how to use this application.
tour.tabs: You can switch the tabs to move between chat and workspace.
tour.syncCode: You can update code from here
tour.switchToDialogue: Okay, let's back to chat tab.

minecraft-core.connectInfo: Connect your Minecraft from **/connect {{host}}/vm/{{userCode}}/mc**. Try again if connection failed. Turn off encryption request.

dialogue.Introduction: Hi! click the quick reply button of type in your questions to choose what to do!
